content: Juventus keeper Buffon (left) was sent off by referee Michael Oliver against Real Madrid

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: Juventus captain Gianluigi Buffon says he stands by the comments he made about referee Michael Oliver after their dramatic

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p a span
html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: Buffon was sent off for dissent after Oliver awarded Real an injury-time penalty, and later said the official had

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p a span
content: "a bag of rubbish for a heart".

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: "The content remains and I stand by all of it," the keeper told Italian TV.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: "I'd say them all again - maybe with a different type of language."

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: The 40-year-old Italy international added: "You find a way to speak, right or wrong, that at times can seem excessive - but this is me, I am Gigi Buffon."

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div ul li a span
content: Police investigate threatening texts sent to Oliver's wife

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div ul li a span
content: #ItaliaLovesMichaelOliver - Italian fans back English referee after Twitter abuse

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: Juventus had come back from losing 3-0 at home to lead 3-0 at the Bernabeu in the second leg of the last-eight tie on Wednesday.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: Oliver awarded the Spanish side a 93rd-minute penalty for Mehdi Benatia's foul on Lucas Vazquez, which Cristiano Ronaldo scored to send Real through 4-3 on aggregate.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: Buffon said on Wednesday that it was a "dubious incident" and, speaking on Saturday, he said he had been defending "my team-mates and fans, even in a not very composed fashion".

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: He added that he still believed 33-year-old Oliver lacked experience.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: "I'm sure Oliver will have a great career in future, but he's too young to officiate a match like that," the goalkeeper added.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: "A referee with more experience would not have blown his whistle and decided not to become the protagonist of the match.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: "He would have left it running, turned around and let the two teams fight it out in extra time. Let the pitch do the talking."

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
html body div div div div div div div div div article div p a span
html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: sent to Oliver's wife, Lucy, after she was abused on fans on social media.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div h3 span
content: 'It's always easy to judge from the outside'

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: Juventus boss Massimiliano Allegri had earlier defended Buffon's reaction, saying for 20 years he had been "a role model on and off the pitch".

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: "If on one occasion he said the things he did, in a situation as tough as Wednesday night's, that is understandable and I challenge anyone to react differently," Allegri said.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: "It's always easy to judge from the outside.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: "The referee had a very good game for 90 minutes, he really did. He then slightly lost his way at the end - but these things can happen.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: "I don't know if it was correct or not, I don't care. But Buffon was also sent off and therefore denied the opportunity to save the Cristiano Ronaldo penalty. Gigi's reaction is to be understood."

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div p span
content: Real Madrid manager Zinedine Zidane put Buffon's comments down to the keeper being "stressed", adding: "You have to respect his point of view, but I think we deserved to qualify for the semi-finals."

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div article div figure figcaption span
content: Match of the Day presenter Gary Lineker believes Buffon should apologise for his post-match comments
